title: SpeciedexCore
blurb: Inference kernel for species ID, evolution mapping, and tokenized outputs â€” designed with architecture rigor inspired by Bitcoin Core.
description: SpeciedexCore provides a deterministic, testable engine for species classification and lineage graph construction. It emphasizes reproducibility, auditability, and verifiable artifacts. Pipelines pin model + transform versions, export hash-chained bundles, and support signed manifests for long-term archival.

versions.notes: Graph export v2, reproducible pipelines, signed bundle manifests.
CLI classify + bundle export; deterministic transforms.
Initial engine layout, dataset pinning, baseline models.
